content.detailedDescription: I was standing on my patio deck having a smoke and looking up at the stars. i noticed an object moving through the stars that i thought was a sattelite at first. it was a little bit brighter and it had no tail like a comet would. it was moving very strangley. it would pulse forward a very noticeable distantce instantly. i watched this small, star-like object pulse more frequently until there was a sudden, giant, bright light like an explosion and it was gone. a  second later, another of the same sudden explosion type light happened again in the same place in,the sky. i was very much in shock while watching this and i had a feeling come over me that i have never felt before. its hard to explain. i have never seen anything like that in my life. i felt comforted, if that makes sense to anyone.
content.summary: Star-like ufo pusling forward through the stars instantly then disappears following a giant, bright, sudden flash follwed by another flash,seconds later

content.detailedDescription: We walked outside on a third floor balcony, and looked south towards downtown orlando around 11:30pm.  looking at a cluster of stars, one began moving from a southeastern position travelling straight north.  at first glance, we thought the object was a plane, or perhaps a shooting star, but dismissed both of those ideas when we noticed how fast the object was moving, and that it had no tail, nor did it burn out, like shooting stars normally do.  the object traveled on a straight path heading from south to north.  the sighting caused us to question what we were seeing, and ultimately, phoned a friend to tell him what we saw, and he referred us to this website.  we lost sight of the object after it left our immediate line of sight, over the building we are in, and the trees.
content.summary: High altitude point of light moving at high rate of speed

content.detailedDescription:
Have video of object on security tape.Don't know what it is and don't claim
it to be from another world.You can review the video and make your own
determinations.I'm curious for an explanation of what the camera caught.
i just observed this tranparent object and pressed the record botton on the monitor.

i was in bed watching tv and noticed the object on the camera monitor which is along side the tv.


the object was moving up and down above my car and would move from left to right which caught my attention.
content.summary: Transparent sphere

content.detailedDescription:
On feb. 9, 20ll i went outside in the dark to hang up a couple of plastic bags that i washed.  the hanger was at the north end of the back deck as i went to hang them up i saw a light in an evergreen tree just 25-30 feet from where i was.
i took 6 steps to the edge and looked at the light.  it was about 8 inches across and very bright.  it went back and forth about 10-12 feet along the branches.  however, it was in front of the branch because the density of the light never changed.   there was no sound.  i stood there my eyes telling me it was seeing an orb in my tree and my brain saying "no, you do not see an orb in the tree."
i had no idea what the orb whas when i saw it.  ( after it left i called 2 neighbors and asked if their grandchildren were outside playing with a flashlight.  they both said no.)
i stood there watching for about 2 min.  it was getting cold so i ran into the house to get a coat.  i grabbed a coat and my cellphone.  it was still there!! i stood there watching and called my husband.  i thought i was in control but when he answered i yelled "we have a ufo".  
the light continued moving back and forth.  it was like an alien student was doing a paper on a fir tree for a science project.  the light never moved up or down, just back and forth.  i was so stunned i never thought of running through the house to the front yard and looking at the light from the back.  my camera would not have had a battery in it so never thought of taking a picture.
when it left it went up a few feet and just disappeared.
i still can not believe what i saw.  however, i still check that tree probably 4 times a week hoping to see it again.
content.summary: Round, bright light in tree 25 feet away

content.detailedDescription:
At first english is my 2nd language. 
was quiet long ago by now. the main thing i wanted to say compare to always what i saw on tv > it wasn't completely silence> i am protesting!!! the noise is similar than roller-blade wheels spinning all together a type of whistle... 
for the date> it is roughly beginning year of 2004 late afternoon early evening> my though was whoa! must go to iraq!!!...What a technology we've got here!!...
then next hours and days then weeks and months, i have ever heard anything on radio or tv> nothing. so i shout my mouth, staying silence or once awhile when friends talked about "ufo" i asked about it if ever heard about a sighting in naples fl explaining; me and other drivers were at that intersection of airport rd and vanderbilt extension and the huge triangle object was going north, north east smooth flying like flooting above us on my right side and i was on north bound on the left lane ready to turn left/west stopped at the red traffic light, then when it passed green >every other drivers left keep going and i was left alone stopped sticking my head of the sun-roof opening to look at it and this when i realized and heard the sound of spinning bearings types, kind of whistling> was coming from that flooting object. i describe the sound like spinning roller-blades weeles.  
if anyone frm naples saw it> i'd love to talk to them> give them my email and communicate about it. 
thank you for your time.
helene
content.summary: Flooting smooth above

content.detailedDescription: I was in the parking lot and didn't hear any sound till it was right over head. it was a bar like objust that had a very loud sound but only when it was right over head. i saw it for about 1 or 2 seconds but after i saw it i could hear f18's being scrambled from palm springs international air port.It had alternating red and green lights but not the same colors as conventional aircraft there was no acl lights on it and no whit lights. i was at work and my work is in the flight path of the airport so i know what aircraft look like at night. this was not a normal aircraft.
content.summary: Bar like about 120-200 feet off the ground

content.detailedDescription: While sitting in a parking lot i noticed a flashing/reflective object at about 10,000 feet making a slight arc as it was falling-flying towards the ground. as it approached a treeline about 3 miles away it leveled off and flew above the trees at about 50-100 feet for about 1/4 mile. it then stopped, flew backwards for maybe a few 100 yards. then continued forward out of site as it flew above the treeline going east near franktown area. about 5-10 seconds later i could see it back at about 10000 feet or so about maybe 5-8 miles away and watched it go out of site towards the east. it was very bright, looked like something that was chrome plated, possibly triangle shaped, spinning and reflecting the sunlight. it was flickering-flashing at a consistent rate of speed. it was a perfectly clear sunny day with light winds. i have no idea what it was. it was not a plane, helicopter, balloon, nor remote control plane.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Very strange bright flashing chrome object

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pictures of the sunset and as i was reviewing the pictures i noticed this circular object i did not notice this as i was taking the pics
content.summary: No idea what this is

content.detailedDescription: Me and my family were on our way back from tuscaloosa one night around ten, ten thirty p.M. when i looked out my window and saw what looked like a flying sauser with lights aluminating it. it was semi flat sort of like two plates stacked on top of one another. it was almost hovering almost right over the tree line when i noticed it. it took off fairly quickly for something so big. if it were to land, it would have taken up almost if not all and more so of my back yard. about a minute after i saw it, if not sooner, it was gone over the other tree line on the oposite side of the road and well out of sight. i was the only one who saw it because my dad was driving, my mom was talking on her phone and my both of my little brothers were asleep. i didn't tell my parents because it was late and my dad was irritated because not to much earlier, about an hour, my brothers got into a fight. i didn't tell my mother because she was talking to someone on her phone all the way home, and when we got home, i had to go to bed because it was pretty late.
content.summary: Sauser-like flying object with lights around it on the way back from tuscaloosa one night.

content.detailedDescription:
(name deleted)fg & i were walking in st. by side of our house when we saw a green and orange fireball pass from s. to n. over a low ridge and dissappeared (no sound and no fire) into the side of the mt.To the east of us.  we thought we had seen a meteor, but the angle of flight was almost zero (flat trajectory).  the lack of sound and fire was also mysterious.  

a few days later(???), (i was ten years old and ready to start the 5th grade in sept.) i was awakened early one morning (it was just starting to get  light) looking over to the door in my bedroom, (they were extra tall because the previous owner was 6'10' tall.) i saw a gray human like shape at least as tall as the door, standing just inside the doorway.  i was unable to speak for perhaps 30 seconds.  then i called "dad, dad", but the words were hardly loud enough for me to hear, i had the thought that i was asleep and i had a bad dream.  quickly, looking at the creature, i pulled the covers over my head and looked out a peephole i made and the object was gone - no sound.

i had to keep this quiet for fear my friends would think me crazy.  i've kept this secret until i retired from defense work for fear i would lose my s. clearance.  

if you would like i could provide a topo-map showing the approximate path of the object.

i've been retired since 2004 but now i'm writing christian literature.  these books are given free of charge to my students.

thanx
content.summary: Dennis johnson & i were walking in st. by side of our house.When we saw

content.detailedDescription:
Bright summer night. i am in bed in our upstair bedroom with large windown facing the lake.   hot.  all windows open. 1:10am. dog baking woke me, i checked time.  started back to bed when barking stopped, but few min. later dog barking became more intense as he ran around and down by lake. bright moon light, everything bright as day.  moon light path across the water from a 45 degree angle. saw a 2nd light path at 90 degrees.  looked up and saw a "peacock blue sphere about 300' up.  it had a white ring around the sphere and a beam of light decending to the water.  the beam hit the water aprox. 1/4 of a mile out from my home.  it was moving slowly toward me.  i thought it was a helicoptor, perhaps searching for someone, but there was no sound at all.  even in "whisper mode" you can here a "womp womp" sound from a chopped.  the object passed in from of the full moon and was clearly a solid object, sphere shapped with no visiable wings or tail assembly. - - it was pfretty exciting.  i watched intently.  the light got closer and closer.  i began to feel some alarm.  what the heck was this???  then, just as the object passed over the shore line and the beam of light touched my lawn, it winked out.  the object was just gone.  there was so sign of anything up there at all.  never a single sound, and even with the bright moonlight, i could see nothing in the sky.

i had an earlier sighting as well.  about 1972, and this was also seen by several others here.            (name deleted)fg
content.summary: Dog strtted  barking, woke up to quite him, so neighbors where not disturbed., he then moved from side of house to back.  hot summer night all windows open. full moor w/moorpath across lake. saw another light path on water and looked up.  object appeared

content.detailedDescription: Multiple abductions and close encounters.  if interested call.  have met aliens and interacted with them.  thank you
content.summary: Silver disc  ship  hovering about three feet off ground,, went aboard   tall alien, very thin,  floated me on my back

content.detailedDescription:
First off, this isn't a one time occurrence. this happens every night. i am currently residing in clearlake, ca and the lake is directly behind our house. 

this is a small town without many people or lights so the sky's are very clear. we always see stars that definately move. they flash different colors, red, blue, white, and green. they stick out in the sky. i have sat on my porch and watched these "stars" appear out of thin air, move and disappear. they also seem to interact with each other. i've also seen giant "balls of light" in the sky that come up over the mountains and hover for various durations of time before landing and disappearing.

the incident on june 1st was as follows. my roommate and i were sitting on the porch waiting for these "lights" we always see. we didn't have to wait long. a very large orb came up over the mountain, it was flashing red and blue. it was very bright, almost neon. i ran inside and alerted my room mates so that they could see it to.  we were astonished by how bright and strange this particular orb was. it stayed above the mountain for 10 minutes or so before slowly defending and vanishing.

i have no explanations for what these things are. i know alot of people who see the same things that i do. b
content.summary: Very bright flashing blue and red orb flies over and lands in mountains ever night.

content.detailedDescription: I was at a bar in edwardsville il talking to a friend and a server when i happend to look up and see something greeen, very bright and extremly large ( way bigger the any aircraft i have seen)  it looked as if it may have been exploding and seemed to have like a green tail to it. it was cloud out this evening so we know it was below the clouds. several other people also happend to see it at the bar i was at. then i mentioned it on facebook and people from sevearl miles away even acroos the river in st louis had also confirmed they saw the same thing.   anyway it was moving very fast and it was gone as fast as it came. sorry im not the greatest writer but what i saw was truly amazing.
content.summary: It was a green object going very fast coming from the southwest and heading northease

content.detailedDescription:
My brother and i were traveling north on canal road in the afternoon, bright sunshine and no wind. the windows were down in the vehical we were traveling in, as there was no ac in vehical, the object appeared from are right traveling west. it was moving at a high rate of speed. the object had no decernible markings and absolutely no sound whatever. the object disappeard because of trees blocking are view. both my brother and i were astounded by the speed it was traveling. 
what made us notice the object in the first place was the britness of the object during the daylight. this object was not a jet plane or any other man made object. our feelings at the time was we witnessed a ufo.
content.summary: Round object, pale green in color

content.detailedDescription: May 31, 2011 7:45 pm, i went outside to feed horses.  i saw a definite silver cylinder with slightly rounded ends, about the apparent same size of an ordinary passenger jet, traveling almost overhead, at a fairly slow speed, although a person could not have outrun it.  there was no sound, although about 2 minutes later, well after the object had disappeared, i heard the sound of an ordinary plane coming from the opposite direction and yet could not see this plane.  the object traveled west to east at a level altitude but much lower than a commercial plane - perhaps just a few thousand feet. very smooth movement, very smooth shiny surface, but there were definitely no wings, as i could see the back end of it as it moved away from me.  at one point, there seemed to be air displacement around it. just after that point, i think it may have separated horizontally slightly for a brief moment, at which time there seemed to be a red band between the two sections. the sky was blue and cloudless. from the time i noticed it in the sky until it disappeared, it traveled a distance of perhaps several miles. it seemed to just fade away, but that could have been because of distance. sighting lasted about 1 minute and was fascinating. i did not have time to go back inside for my camera.
content.summary: Silver cylinder in daylight

content.detailedDescription: May 31, 2011 7:45 pm, i went outside to feed horses.  i saw a definite silver cylinder with slightly rounded ends, about the apparent same size of an ordinary passenger jet, traveling almost overhead, at a fairly slow speed, although a person could not have outrun it.  there was no sound, although about 2 minutes later, well after the object had disappeared, i heard the sound of an ordinary plane coming from the opposite direction and yet could not see this plane.  the object traveled west to east at a level altitude but much lower than a commercial plane - perhaps just a few thousand feet. very smooth movement, very smooth shiny surface, but there were definitely no wings, as i could see the back end of it as it moved away from me.  at one point, there seemed to be air displacement around it. just after that point, i think it may have separated horizontally slightly for a brief moment, at which time there seemed to be a red band between the two sections. the sky was blue and cloudless. from the time i noticed it in the sky until it disappeared, it traveled a distance of perhaps several miles. it seemed to just fade away, but that could have been because of distance. sighting lasted about 1 minute and was fascinating. i did not have time to go back inside for my camera.
content.summary: Silver cylinder in daylight

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to my girlfriends house in the west salem hills. to get to her house you must climb a steep hill that, if traveling in a car, puts you facing the western sky. it was very sporadic weather that whole day having been sunny, overcast, and raining. there had also been thunder and lightning earlier. as i was traveling up the hill i noticed two small dots of light in the sky. they were orange in color and appeared to be very high in the air. they caught my attention immediately because they were moving in very random patterns, zig-zaging around in a very erratic ways. i knew quite instantly that i was observing ufos. i have seen documentaries that describe similar sightings and because i am quite positive nothing that i have ever seen in the air has the ability to move in these ways. i was absolutely in awe of this spectacle, mostly because i am very interested in ufos and am an unwavering believer in their existence. i stopped my car in the middle of the street and continued to observe the ufos for a few moments before deciding to pull out my cell phone and call my girlfriend and tell her to go outside and see them for herself. it was at this moment one of the dots seemed to fade quickly away, as if zipping off into the atmosphere. i continued to watch the other one as it danced around in the same random fashion. just as i got my girlfriend on the phone the remaining ufo zipped away, slower than the first but in the same direction and fashion. i described the event to my girlfriend and several other close friends afterward.
content.summary: Two small round dancing lights

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were out looking at the stars se from our house. we saw this super fast moving light moving rapidly through the sky. at first we thought is was just a super fast plane, but was to star shaped for a plain. we then noticed it moving around in circles. it then started to so in s shaped movements. it would disappear w/o any sign or trace. after about 30 secs. of being gone it would re-appear moving in the same type of patterns then disappear again, this happened for about ten min. total. on it's final return, an object w/ a similar shape, returned w/ it. they moved in similar patterns but in opposite directions, then would fly by each other very closely, which in my eyes looked like only inches apart. why wife and i both assured each other that what we were seeing was real and that we both looking at the same thing, it felt that unreal. after watching this for about 15 min or so, while calling friends and family, all of which couldn't see it, they just both disappeared into the night sky. after watching the sky for another 5 min and seeing nothing more we finally just came to this sight to report this unbelievable event. it sounds crazy but it's 100% real.
content.summary: 1 then 2 flying very rapidly

content.detailedDescription:
After work i went to sit in the spa. i noticed lights moving to the north of me. there were two and they were close together. the first thought was birds in flight, but, they don't have lights. second thought was remote control planes. they usually fly with the standard aircraft lights. the lights started to perform a maneuver, similar to a lazy eight, during the maneuver the lights disappeared. my thought at that time was that "this is not right." the lights reappeared and started moving to the south, they passed east of my position. one of the lights took up a wingman position, behind and to the left of the lead. they continued to the south, they seemed to be climbing, they eventually faded out, instead of going behind the hill. 

when first seen the lights were lower the outline of glassford hill. after passing the color of the light was golden.
content.summary: Lights in formation

content.detailedDescription:
My son and i were outside walking the dog when i was looking up at the stars. i saw a really really bright one with a small one next to it , thinking maybe it was venus but never saw a small one next to it before  . i pointed it out to my son to look up at asking him what he thought and as he looked up too and i was still asking him what his thoughts were right underneath the star i thought was venus, a bright ball of light appeared and got brighter and brigtter and brighter, and then very quickly took off, but within like 3- 4 seconds just dissapeared right before our eyes  ! we both at the same time said " did you see that? "
neither of us  have never before seen anything like this, definately not a plane, nor a shooting star or anything that i know of.
content.summary: Round ball of light that got brighter and brighter then moved swiftly for a few seconds and just disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
Monday morning, about 4:22 am, may 31st:
firstly, let me say, i am of sane mind, and i was sober (i do not drink or use drugs). i was getting ready to get into my car to go to work, my car was parked facing out of my driveway (west), and i must of glanced up and then turned to get into my car... but, i paused. something caught my eye, so i looked up again. it took a second for my eyes and my brain to make sense of what had caught my eye, but when my confused brain finally figured it out, i about crapped myself (really). above the house across the street, and above it's mature trees, and i believe it was actually fairly high in the sky... but, it was increadably hard to tell how high, there were two bright star-like (only brighter) white lights, slowly following eachother across the sky. but, i don't think that's the part that caught my eye... i think it was the fact that there was a misty/hazy blue/white light showering down from them in a curved manner, that almost made it look like there could be a ?Solid? upside down triangle benieth them. i even watched to see if the 'triangle' area in the center would pass over any stars and obstruct my view of them, but it didn't even pass over a single star. after looking at it about 10 or 15 seconds, i realized i had my camera on me, so i shakily took it out of my purse, all while repeatedly glancing upward at the object. i began recording, when it was almost strait over-head, and recorded for 1 min, 11 sec, until it disappeared behind some trees beside my house. (unfortunatally, my 14mp kodak camera does not record well at night, so all i got was black screen, heavy breathing, and then 'blair witch' type commentary once i realized how heavily i was breathing on film. but, if any of you official ppl from mufon care to contact me, to analyze my vid and see if you can pull anythiing out of it, that would be great... i know nothing about video editing.) so, once it disappeared from sight, i stopped recording, and though i was terrified, i was also in awe, so i put my camera down and ran around to the side of my house to watch it disappear to the horizon and the very barely early daylight. the creepiest part though, is that the further away it got, the more it appeared as though it was really, litterally spraying something down (the hazy light). this was definatally unlike any ufo footage i have ever seen, it was sooo strange. cannot find anything that compares! never thought i would see a ufo living here, as we have 2 airforce bases, 1 army base and norad!!!

the stats (flat out):
-2 fixed (not varying in distance from eachother) bright white lights
-perfectly angled/aligned with the direction of travel (approx. sw to ne)
-a whitish-blue light/haze/mist? showering down from them in a curved manner, almost creating a possible solid upside-down triangle below them.
-absolutally no sound
-slow steady track across the sky
-i belive it was fairly high up, which would make it very large.
-no flashing lights
-light/haze/mist? was not 'trailing' behind them, but rather, keeping constant below them

beings i got no good video of the event, i have attatched my best artist rendition of what i saw.

please, let me know if this sounds anything like anything anyone has ever seen before!!!
content.shape: Cigar,   Cylinder,   Star-like,   Triangle,   Other,   Unknown
content.summary: 2 bright lights, fixed and angled w/ direction of travel (sw to ne) with blue/white haze/light curved downward to make almost a triangle below?  no sound. awe and terror.

content.detailedDescription: my husband and i were sitting on the roof of the house and we were watching the stars and watching airplanes in the distance (approx 10 pm central time). we were out there for an hour or so total. at 10:26 pm we noticed a yellowish/orange bright ball of light appear out of nowhere,just above the tree lilne in the front yard,the object seemed to move a little closer in our direction (we were north of the object). at first we though it was an air plane but noticed it had no blinking lights and the light was too large to be a plane that far away. i would say it was atleast a mile or two away. the object quickly veered eastward then faded away. it did not fade into the distance, it faded as if a battery lost its power. we were very baffled and tried to find logical explanations for what we had just seen..We sat on the same spot of the roof for the next 3 nights and every night between 10:25 pm and 10:35 pm we saw the same thing appear. it would just come out of nowhere then within 5 or 10 seconds it disappears. its not cell phone towers or spot lights or planes or helicopters, even planes that far away can be heard from the ground, we heard nothing when the light appears. the object also moves in different directions, but always fades away to the east.The 3rd night we saw this object we managed to get a picture but its so far away that you cant make out any detail. it looks like an orange/yellow ball of light when magnified. we have no idea what this object is but we have never seen anything like it. we are going to try to get video of it tonight. we have looked at some ufo websights and there was a video from kingsport tennessee that looks almost identical to what we are seeing.
content.summary: Yellowish bight,yet foggy circular light

content.detailedDescription: I did not see a ufo but i have seen two beings on the side of my bed.One was taller than the other one they both had big heads.It was dark in the room but i was still able to see an outline.The shorter one had a pen like flashlight it was was floating in front of it a if they were controlling it.It seemed as if it was tryin to get my attention.Something inside of me wasnt afraid so i reached out to the light an the taller one reached out of the dark to place its hand on my wrist.Its hands were like human but it was grey and it answered my thoughts in my head {telepathy)it was a mans voice.It then released my hand.Both stayed there for second then the pen light were gone.I believe they are responsible for my strange gift of astral projecting and other things bsince i was small.Who are they?I know for a fact we are not alone .I have visited other planets not in our solar system.
content.summary: Unknown

content.detailedDescription: Cms/mcm in 1979 witness was 17 yo airman on lowry afb (now defunct) in denver area.  he and two witnesses observed a circular object with lights around the edge, flying very slowly overhead at about 200 ft.  50 meters wide, no sound, quite large, approached diagonally while they were walking in the dark in a snowfield on the base.  they followed object for about 20 mins until they reached a fenceline and could go no further.
content.summary: Observed circular object with lights flying over lowry afb

content.detailedDescription:
I didn't actually see the object firsthand. i noticed the moon that night and it was very beautiful so i snapped a picture over it and i saw this boomerang thing. i have seen these objects firsthand once before in granbury, texas. see the above picture for a good look. sorry that the photo is so pixilated.

i was in granburry texas when i was a boy and i saw this same thing, now when i saw it foirsthand, i saw the center light change from red to green, red to green, i believe it was taking a picture. the object literally fell out of the sky, it began as a star and sped down at an incredible rate. themn it hovered for about two minutes, then sped off into the distance.

when i took this picture, i was actually photographing the moon, and noticed it later, my mind instantly went back to that night in granbury.
content.summary: Photo taken of boomerang shaped object next to moon, photo taken sometime around september 25th

content.detailedDescription: I just got home from work and i looked up at the sky to enjoy the clear sky with no moon shining.  as i was looking towards the western sky i noticed a cluster of lights that at first looked like the little dipper.  the formation got bigger and closer at a fast rate of speed, it appeared and was out of sight in less than ten seconds.  it took up as much space in the sky as a 747 would, however, it was very high up in the sky.  the body of the craft seemed to be somewhat translucent  but not see through.  it was not a complete v-shape, the left wing was only half as long as the right.  the right wing had five lights on it and the left wing had three lights.  the lights were somewhat dim.  it was moving from west to east and vanished with no sound or trace.
content.summary: V shaped craft over san bernardino county viewed from montclair california

content.detailedDescription:
At 4:50am while working at the u. p. s. worldport ramp 9 spot 29 location, my attention was drawn to a departing commercial flight taking off nearby.. the moment i looked up i noticed a dark object passing directly overhead.. traveling northeast at a slow speed.. the object was completely dark with a bright solid light at the rear.. this object didn't have any noticeable faa required becon lights and didn't match the appearance of an aircraft circling because of a missed approach.. it continued on a northeast course till i lost sight..
it should be stated i have over 26 years experience working around aircraft and have witnessed arriving and departing aircraft numerous time.. what concerns me most is just how close this object was to the departing flight at take off..
content.summary: Object passed over louisville international airport while a commercial aircraft was departing within 500 yards

content.detailedDescription:
I decided to get up to watch the endeavor shuttle launch from my front yard. i must admit, i was watching the sky all around the shuttle for weird cloud formations my mother had mentioned previously witnessing. shortly after the launch the shuttle was visible from jacksonville, fl. out of the corner of my eye, to the right of the shuttle. i am not very good at estimating distances but i believe the object was in jacksonville airspace, not cape canaveral. it was high in the sky, about as high as planes normally fly. initially, i brushed it off as a plane but it didn't look right to me so i kept glancing back over it. it was insanely shiny, silver, chrome looking. from my vantage it seemed completely spherical. it seemed to just be floating and in the same direction as the shuttle and kinda fading and reappearing into view as the sun hit it. my overall impression of the object was that it was an insanely chrome-shiney ball floating at a slow speed. as soon as the shuttle was no longer visible, i looked back to the object. it had stopped moving in the sky and i observed it for a few more seconds before it suddenly shot straight up and disappeared at a very high rate of speed and i wished i had pulled out my cell phone camera (odds are i wouldnt have caught much though, it was really far away and my cell phone video camera isnt the best)

i immediately called my mom and started to tell her about the object. she then mentioned she had seen the exact same thing but thought her eyes were playing tricks on her. she was facing in the opposite direction of the shuttle launch (she was not sure which way to look, so she missed it) so i believe we did not view the same object.

i will admit i was a bit biased before this sighting as i do believe there is unexplained arial phenomena (that i tend to attribute to extraterrestrial forces), but at the same time i personally would like to remain completely impartial. i have been looking to the skys since childhood hoping to see a ufo and have even tried to talk myself into believing the rare blimp sighting or odd looking plane sighting was a ufo sighting, but i always erred on the side of objective reality. the entire time i viewed this object (an object that actually almost distracted me from watching my first shuttle launch ever) i was trying to talk myself out of the bizarre things i was witnessing. the only thing that convinced me this object was not an identifiable aircraft was its high speed vertical shoot into the sky.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo tracking shuttle launch then quickly shooting upwards and disappearing

content.detailedDescription:
Looking out over the ocean (atlantic) out to the ese.  45 degrees above horizon a pair of lights illuminated.  simiar to car headlights.  after several seconds, the pair of lights extinguised then another pair illuminated  off to the right (south) of the original pair.  a third pair illumnated below, at about 25 degrees off the horizon.  the lights alternated between each other...At one point all 3 pairs were illuminated.  the final pair illuminated again then extinguished.  the event lasted no more than 2 to 3 minutes - but may have been ongoing before i noticed it.  this was witnessed by 2 other observers present with me after i called their attention to the display.

i am an avid aviation enthusiast and noted no movent, no navigation lights an no beacons asociated with the lights.  the lights did not appear to move - just illuminate then extinguish - followed by the next pair lighting up - almost as if they were in sync with one another - but thousands of yards - if not several miles apart (estimate).

this was nothing short of a very strange event.  these were not flares, fireworks of other pyrotechnics - as they did not ascend or descend.  they maintained a constant altitude and azimuth.  they simply illuminated and extinguished then repeated the sequence among themselves - at one point all 3 pairs were illuminated.  once they stopped - that was the end.  i contnued to look out over the ocean for 20 to 30 minutes to see if anything else would happen - but noticed nothing else unusual.
content.summary: Multiple pairs of lights alternating on/off between each other
